{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/title|size}}
{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto size() requires ranges::sized_range&lt;V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto size() const requires ranges::sized_range&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

返回元素数量。

令 {{rlpi|/#数据成员|base_}} 为底层视图，并令 {{rlpi|/#数据成员|stride_}} 为存储的步长值。等价于：
{{source|1=
return /*to-unsigned-like*/(/*div-ceil*/(ranges::distance(base_), stride_));
}}

===参数===
（无）

===返回值===
元素的数量。返回值的计算如同表达式

{{c|(ranges::size(base_) / stride_) + ((ranges::size(base_) % stride_ ? 1 : 0)}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;forward_list&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    namespace vs = std::views;
    constexpr static auto v = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
    static_assert
    (
        vs::stride(v, 1).size() == 5 and
        vs::stride(v, 2).size() == 3 and
        vs::stride(v, 3).size() == 2 and
        vs::stride(v, 4).size() == 2 and
        vs::stride(v, 5).size() == 1 and
        vs::stride(v, 6).size() == 1
    );

    std::forward_list list{v};
//  auto s = vs::stride(list, 2).size(); // 错误：不是 sized_range
}
}}
